This is the demo of the rendered [Retroweb template](rwt), a 
[Quarto](quarto) websites using the [Retroweb](rwe) theme extension.


## Getting started

To get started we need to clone the [template](wrt) repository as well
as cloning the quarto extension which contains the [Retroweb](wre) extension.

```
git clone https://github.com/retostauffer/retroweb-template.git mywebsite
cd mywebsite
git submodule add https://github.com/retostauffer/retroweb-ext.git _extensions/retroweb
```

When cloned, the extension can be installed and the page rendered.

```
quarto install extension .
quarto render
```

The website will be rendered into `docs/`.


## Block-carousel shortcode

`{{{< blockcarousel [image1] [image2] ... id = [elementId] >}}}` allows to create block
carousels within the content of the page. Currently no additional support for
options (TODO(R)).

<!-- bootstrap 5 image carousel -->
{{< blockcarousel header-images/unsplash-1.jpg header-images/unsplash-2.jpg id = "block_carousel_1" >}}
